title: Thai-inspired barbecued steak
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons Thai chilli sauce, such as Blue Dragon', '4 tablespoons Thai Fish Sauce, such as Barts', '1 1/2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil', '1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger root', '3 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed', '1kg (2 lb) flank steak']
